attr.title: FAITH: The Unholy Trinity
attr.desc: From the developer, Airdorf Games: "FAITH is a pixel horror game inspired by the era of classic 8-bit gaming and the Satan Scare of the 1980s. Use your holy crucifix to perform exorcisms, fight back against possessed cultists, and cleanse haunted objects. Discover a world of dread, isolation, and mystery as you explore haunted forests, abandoned churches, and the inner sanctums of a Satanic cult."
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or GOG and add the game data to 'ports/faiththeunholytrinity/assets', important files are data.win, audiogroup1.dat through audiogroup18.dat, and UTconfigs.cvs files.
